Title: NJ Attorney General joins suit to stop Trump's federal grant freeze

Title: 66 million years ago, a fish chewed up and spit out food. It's now a fossil in Denmark
Description:
The fossil was found at a cliff in Denmark.
Fossilized vomit is called regurgitalite, and it's a type of trace fossil, which tells scientists about an organism's daily life.

Title: Here's how climate change fueled the Los Angeles fires
Description:
Extreme conditions helped fuel the fast-moving fires that destroyed thousands of homes.
Scientists are working to figure out how climate change played a role in the disaster.

Title: TikTok Shop's former boss on how the platform changed e-commerce forever — and how AI is leveling the playing field
Description:

She said social commerce and AI have changed online shopping forever.

Title: A serial home flipper with over 25 years of experience shares 7 common renovation mistakes people make
